=== Design ===
Turrican Murrine is my last attempt to get a clean and easy on the eyes theme for the Ubuntu desktop.. hope you like it!

Suggested icon theme: Erectus by Jonian (http://www.gnome-look.org/content/show.php/Erectus?content=100254)

Metacity theme: Unified by Dobee (http://www.gnome-look.org/content/show.php/Unified+Gloss?content=109391)
